website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice that fits most vehicles.
pros: Sports a strong aluminum frame with stylish black powder coating
cons: You have to purchase a separate mounting system to install them, and they look too short on some larger vehicles

customer_reviews.title: These met my picky requirements and look great on my Durango
customer_reviews.text: These fit my 2013 perfectly with the bracket/install kit. You have to have the kit. Only the running boards come in this box. They look great. I bought them to help my son in and out of the car at carpool at school. I wanted a board that didn’t stick out too far for me to bang my shins on and I don’t care for the chrome boards that add an extra chrome strip next to the existing chrome stripe already on the car. That looks redundant to me, but that’s my personal preference. My pics show one side before and one side after.
customer_reviews.author: JKU Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These running boards are really nice. There are two reasons why I didn't give a full 5 star. Two complaints I have; one of which goes for any product that needs mounting hardware; is that anything that needs mounting hardware, WHY IS IT SOLD SEPERATELY!?! And I don't believe it has anything to do with pricing the product because either way you have to spend the money, so why not just include it? My second complaint is that even though they seem pretty rugged, I feel they would need a middle mounting bracket. They are decently sturdy, I just find that over time that may fade.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: DON"T BUY FOR 2016 FORD EDGE
customer_reviews.text: If you have a 2016 Ford Edge, don't buy these running boards. The actual running boards are excellent, but the problem lies with the installation kit. To install the brackets that hold the running boards, you have to remove four protective covers that shield the under-body of the vehicle. So now I have exposed sheet metal with holes, exposed brake lines, an exposed rubber hose that goes to the gas tank, etc... If Dee Zee had some form of template that would indicate what to trim out of the panels would fix this problem. So now I am going to have to try to figure out how to trim the panels to reinstall them.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I did quite a bit of research before buying the Dee Zee DZ16201 running boards and mounting kit. Many had mounting kit that were multi piece and you had to bolt them together. The Dee Zee mounting kit are single piece bracket, designed specifically for your vehicle. A number of other products required drilling holes into your car frame, who want to drill out their brand new car. The Dee Zee mounting kit required no drilling, in my case, two bolts secure the mount to the chassis. The running boards themselves were easy to install onto the brackets. It took me about an hour to mount and install both sides. I would highly recommend the Dee Zee product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B Myers

customer_reviews.title: These running boards look great on my Acadia
customer_reviews.text: These running boards look great on my Acadia. My toddler can now easily climb in on his own, and I don't have to worry about the driver seat being fatigued from sliding in and out. The mounting bracket will not receive such a good review. If you are installing these on and Acadia, don't even attempt to install the top bolt on the brackets.
customer_reviews.author: WesA

customer_reviews.title: Love the look in my 2016 Ford Explorer!
customer_reviews.text: Mine came in solid Matt black for my 2016 Ford Explorer, which I expected. Remember, these boards do not come with brackets. You will need to buy separate brackets specifically for your vehicle. Installation takes about an hour. It was a little tricky trying to put the brackets in the vehicle at first, but once you get an idea on how they should be placed in the vehicle, it's pretty easy. Not sure about other reviews about not getting chrome (it says on the specifications on what they should expect to get).
customer_reviews.author: Sek Meas

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Looking
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the solid black running boards. They really make getting into our 2019 Chevy Traverse much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Bookmama

customer_reviews.title: 2017 dodge durango
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my wife's 2017 dodge durango gt hoping they would fit . I also ordered part #16241 bracket kit and they worked on her car so in case anyone is interested they do fit a 2017 model. They are good quality and pretty easy to Install. The instructions could be a little better but after you get under the car and start looking it's easy to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie h.

customer_reviews.title: Gives the car a nice sporty look and should help keep some of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Gives the car a nice sporty look and should help keep some of the winter slush and grime off of the sides of the vehicle. It also gives one a convenient place to knock ones shoes against before stepping into the vehicle if you have been walking through the snow or slush. They do stick out a bit from the side so one has to extend their leg more to clear when exiting the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: awesome. MUST HAVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: awesome running boards. works well on my 2014 nissan pathfinder. Update: 10/30/2015. Still works and looks like new. Very easy to install and remove. Contacted the seller since I'm moving the item to a different car...seller was very accommodating, and will be sending me a replacement part for the bracket which I can't remove from the old car!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to 2016 Explorer.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Really works well in style and function. Fits 2016 Ford Explorer Sport perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Dont fit 2011 escape
customer_reviews.text: The fitment was wrong. Says ot will fit 2011 escape but it does not even come close to fitting
customer_reviews.author: adam rowe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit For 2013 Ford Edge Ltd
customer_reviews.text: These running boards were very easy to install. The directions that come with the brackets(sold separately) are self explanatory, but you have to remove part of a plastic cover off the drivers side to mount the front bracket flange.Easily done with a drexel or tin snips. The install took about 1 1/2 hrs. Looks Great. Perfect Fit.
customer_reviews.author: dmenace1

customer_reviews.title: Fit the vehicle perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Made mounting the DZ running boards easy. Purchase the proper mounting brackets for your specific vehicle and mounting is a snap. Good powder coating and should last for years without rusting out.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Gering

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install on 2013 Chevy Equinox
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install on 2013 Chevy Equinox, and looks like it belongs there. This makes it much easier for my wife to get in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Terry C

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install & Looks GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I have to say is, these look GREAT on my 2012 4Runner! I installed them myself, with no help, and took me just over an hour. I would highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Andrade, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install on my 2013 Toyota 4Runner. Did have to chop off about 2" when I installed front mudguards. Now they stay clean and make it easy to get in. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Stargazey Farm

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for 2014 Ford Explorer
customer_reviews.text: Installed these on a 2014 Ford Explorer. Were easy to use, fit nicely with the profile of the car. They really help the kids to get in and out of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha L.

customer_reviews.title: A non flashy running board that looks great and performs
customer_reviews.text: Running boards arrived quickly. The boards themselves are pretty sturdy but light at the same time. Installation was straight forward and despite deezee saying these wouldn't fit the 2014 and newer 4runner limited these fit great and are just what we needed 2016 toyota 4runner limited
customer_reviews.author: Ariane

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy when using the NXc Running Board Bracket Kit. The install was about 7 minutes once the brackets were installed. Very easy install.
customer_reviews.author: Doda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice running boards, packaged well to prevent damage, and complement my Gen5 4Runner very well.
customer_reviews.author: Constantine

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY FROM THEM UNLESS YOU ARE A MECHANIC.
customer_reviews.text: These look like a new look for running boards, all together, but when I received them, it was only a solid black running board with no chrome accent or anything unique about it like the photo makes it look. I also ordered the brackets to go with it at the same time when I had the page pulled up and clicked on it to buy together, and had noted it was for a 2016 Chevy Traverse, but the brackets came in for a Bronco. I am very disappointed and now I have to pay for return postage. What a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Nay Nay

customer_reviews.title: Good appearance and fairly easy installation
customer_reviews.text: added a nice touch to 2017 Durango and are useful for shorter individuals entering and exiting vehicle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looks. Good for the little people that need ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple installation. Good looks. Good for the little people that need a leg up to enter the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: p23w

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install.
customer_reviews.text: These arrived separatley form the hardware. They installed easily and just serve their purpose as expectly. Solid buy! Recommended for the shorties in your life.
customer_reviews.author: PAOLA

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love them. They don't stick out to far. They are a close fit. So mant people have asked me if they are automatic.
customer_reviews.author: S. Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation.
customer_reviews.text: Work well on my 14 Explorer. bought the brackets also. Easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: Karman

customer_reviews.title: ... the running boards and how they make it so easy to get in and out of the truck
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the running boards and how they make it so easy to get in and out of the truck. They are good looking also.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on the 2014 durango
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on the 2014 durango. The kit needed for the durango r/t is DZ16241 if anyone has a hard time figuring it out like I did :) one tip with the kit is not to over tighten the nuts on the bracket that has pre welded bolts or it will snap!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Nice touch on the Equinox
customer_reviews.text: These Dee Zee running boards are a nice touch on a small SUV. They look great when the door is open and you're stepping up into the seat. They are not thick, and do not stick out much from the body when the door is closed, though. May not prevent door-dings. They work great for getting in/out of either front or rear doors. I was able to put them on myself (with a friend helping) in about 1.5 hours. The brackets are sold separately, but fit perfectly. Mine came directly from Dee Zee, and were made in America. Happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: CollegeTech

customer_reviews.title: Bolted
customer_reviews.text: These are good running boards that look great on my Acadia. The only problem I had was getting the bolts to tighten up, I had to use a screw driver to pull on the bolt while tightening it down. The other thing to remember is the running board does not come with the mounting hardware, it needs to be ordered separately.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great; Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Just had one of these installed on my 2008 RX 350. Helps getting in and out with my bad back. Fits perfectly and looks great. Good value too at around $220 (with Dee Zee discount) for the black-on-black!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aki Jackson

customer_reviews.title: dee zee runningboards
customer_reviews.text: The boards are wellmade and quite sturdy,they are on my 2011 equinox and look real good.would say they are a god buy.
customer_reviews.author: davebp

customer_reviews.title: Running Board Evaluation
customer_reviews.text: I considered this FIVE star evaluation BECAUSE the product is very durable and very attractive and compliments my vehicle. I really meets my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Rose H. Tax

customer_reviews.title: Great running boards - atrocious installation hardware
customer_reviews.text: Awesome running boards. Look great and are well built. Unfortunately, the installation brackets (sold separately but required for installation), are atrocious and difficult to install properly, especially the rears.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: New York
customer_reviews.text: Installed easy looks great material are of high quality black powder coat finish looks great i would recommend this item to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Installed these running boards on a Black 2012 Toyota 4Runner Limited. Looks really sharp, and I prefer these over the chrome since those seem to get chipped or scratched easily by rocks and dirt. I would highly recommend these, and they are super easy to install. Shipping to Alaska only took a few days and was affordable, which also was impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery great product, looks good on my MKX, was easy to install. Had to reinstall support brackets on the front and back on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these running boards for my aunt's 2013 Ford Edge. She was struggling to get in it. I bought the solid black ones and her Edge is white. I have to admitt, it looks nice. I bought the brackets to go with it. So spending a total of about $410 (including installation) was well worth it. The dealership wanted to charge her close to $700.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Molina

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking product. Took some doing, but managed to install it myself with a helper.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Hutchens

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I am not a fan of flashy things, so I choose the black on black for my 2013 Toyota 4Runner. The install was fairly straight forward and simple. I have no issues at this point with these side steps.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Schulli

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: good product, received very fast and installed very easy on my 2013 explorer. looks great on the car, makes it easy to get in and out of.
customer_reviews.author: Tim D.

customer_reviews.title: Hi, I just got this yesterday but I don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I just got this yesterday but I don't know how to install this. Do you have video to show how to install this? And do I need to buy some tools to install this?
customer_reviews.author: Khanh Le

product_meta.title: Dee Zee DZ16201 NXc Black Running Boards
product_meta.description: Dee Zee NXc Steps (board)-The NXc step is designed for today's crossover utility vehicles (CUV).A universal board combined with custom fit brackets (sold separately) fit all listed applications. The board is available in three different finishes for step and trim: Black/Chrome, Black/Black, Stainless/Black. Lightweight aluminum powder coated frame. Full-length protective accent trim. Slip resistant raised rubber grommets on step area. Required custom fit bracket kits sold separately. Black/Black.
feature_bullets: Full-Length Black Powder Coated Accent Trim
Ample 5" Step Area with Raised Rubber Grommets

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars81 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
